comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another angle:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4351618714/in/photostream/]

Here embarking on his voyage to Brazil, for a 1913-1914 expedition to explore the Brazilian jungle -- and eventually as well the 1,000KM "River of Doubt" (renamed the "Rio Roosevelt" following his triumphant return to civilization from the brink of death, after barely surviving a serious leg infection and malaria in the jungle, where he was surrounded by furtive, murderous aborigines, and rivers teeming with piranha).
